title: NonCashDividendTreatmentEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the treatment of Non-Cash Dividends.

oneOf.title: CashEquivalent
oneOf.description: Any non-cash dividend shall be treated as a Declared Cash Equivalent Dividend.

oneOf.title: PotentialAdjustmentEvent
oneOf.description: The treatment of any non-cash dividend shall be determined in accordance with the Potential Adjustment Event provisions.
